caption: The video tells the story of an elderly man who has been bored for a week, during which he recalls that he was once in a car accident. On Friday, three men were chasing and fighting in the woods. One man took a knife and cut another man severely. The knife-wielding man was then chased by a third man. A third man executed the man with the knife. This is when the middle-aged and elderly man in the beginning of the video opens the door and discovers the scene. And shot a third man in the knee. The third man tried to bribe the middle-aged man, but failed. The middle-aged man overpowered the third man.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?
Are there more than three different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than five different characters appear?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?

breakpoint.question: what's in the scene?
breakpoint.answer: Something is burning. There's a flame.
